start.state: Oh, you have need of me?
I sensed your approach. Say no more.
A game? Very well, I can play a few rounds.
I'm glad you thought of me, ~player~. I'm sure we'll all have a grand time!
The Inventory is a lovely place, ~player~. It's so nice to cut loose now and again.
Well, won't this be pleasant? I'm excited to get to know you all.

case.state: Oh, you have need of me?
I sensed your approach. Say no more.
A game? Very well, I can play a few rounds.
It was ~name~ this time, right? Just as foretold.
I knew ~name~ would lose this hand.
~name~, right? Don't lose heart!
You'll be all right, ~name~. Just a minor setback!
I never was very fond of games of chance.
Then... it was ~name~ this time.
How unfortunate. It seems ~name~ lost.
I won this round!
I'm glad you thought of me, ~player~. I'm sure we'll all have a grand time!
The Inventory is a lovely place, ~player~. It's so nice to cut loose now and again.
Well, won't this be pleasant. I'm excited to get to know you all.
Wait a moment... two losses? I erm... P-perhaps I should check something...
You lost twice? A-are you... are you sure? Hmm...
Might I suggest you set aside your armor? I can assure you, you won't need it.
It doesn't look like that armor of yours helps in poker. It might be a good item to remove.
Oh, I'd hardly realized; our hair! We all match! How interesting.
Oh! Is it very common to have blue hair around here? I've never met anyone else like me.
I suppose it's not my place to say, but... should someone of your stature be here?
Your majesty... is... is this truly a good idea?
Take a deep breath, ~name~. We'll get through this, and be better for it.
I know just the thing for a nervous heart. Close your eyes, ~name~.
You can open up to us, ~name~. We won't mock you.
Oh. Should I have warned you that a pair wouldn't suffice?
Don't be upset, ~name~. There was nothing you could've done.
I suppose your hand just wasn't enough this time.
Aimee, please! I know you're confident, but this can't be safe!
It's so loud, Aimee... surely there's a simpler way?
It... it seems that she knows what she's doing...
You're in no danger, ~player~. Though you may wish to cover your ears in the future.
You said your name is Mahiru? I'm Nayru; pleasure to meet you.
Mahiru, was it? I won't forget! Nice to meet you; I'm Nayru.
It's strange... I can sense another. Who's your friend, Ladybug?
So, Ladybug, who is it that stands with you? They have nothing to fear...
My apologies, Natsuki. Perhaps I should've been more forthright.
Perhaps... some help would be in order. Would you mind terribly, ~player~?
It was a good plan! Were your shirt but a hair longer, it would have worked.
My apologies, Natsuki. I've grown accustomed to letting such things happen without intervening.
There's no need to fret, Natsuki. Please, take your time.
Do you need a moment? It's no trouble at all!
Very well, Natsuki. I'm sorry to see you go, but if this is where you must --
Truly? Well... I'm sorry you feel that way, but you're free to --
Something's coming... Shimakaze, do you know...?
Wait a moment, something's... Shima, look out!
Do you feel well, Shimakaze? Something's... wrong...
Oh, dear; here we go again...
Shima? Oh, no...
It's Shima's turn? I... I don't suppose you could just... take something off?
She's going to be further damaged, isn't she? This place certainly attracts all sorts.
Now what? Are you still under attack?
I don't suppose you'll change your... erm... strategy.
Too bad, Shima. Just... don't damage anything while you're... erm... stripping.
Now that I know what to expect... I think you're the easiest to predict, Shima.
Your highness. From which age do you hail?
Oh, I... I didn't expect to see you here, Princess Zelda. It's always nice to meet you.
It's an honor to meet you, princess. Even if these circumstances are... less than ideal.
I'm glad to have met you, Zelda. Perhaps we can speak more later.
Hello, gentlemen. I... I'm glad you thought to ask me to join, ~player~.
Oh! Am I the only lady playing tonight? I... I'm flattered!
Oh! Is this what you call a ladies' night?
Is this game very much different with no men present?
~name~ might be enjoying this. Don't fret; this is why we're here, after all.
~name~ must not be doing very well. You don't think he's losing on purpose, right?
I... I might actually indulge myself, ~player~, if not for... how exposed you already are...
All for the better, ~name~. It's not as though your ~clothing~ protected your modesty...
The game continues. What more is there to say?
I don't need to be an oracle to know what she's taking off next.
Do you know what you'll choose next, ~name~?
This game is a bit ruthless, isn't it? If only we had more time to chat between rounds.
Even knowing how keen her eye is... this is still quite unsettling...
Aimee, I... I'm not immune to weapons...
Keep very still, ~player~. Her aim rarely betrays her.
Are you quite alright, Kyoko? Is there something about your gloves...?
We're not terribly different, Natsuki. I can simply take as much time as I need to compose myself.
You know, Natsuki... I think I can see in you my own nervousness. I simply take a moment as I need to.
I'm very glad you decided to stay with us, Natsuki.
It's nice to see that you aren't leaving!
Ngh! Is that not... painful?
That was a close one. Are you alright?
No matter how many times I see it, it always surprises me.
Even though I know better, it's hard to believe that doesn't hurt.
I - oh! P-pardon me, ~name~.
Just as expected. W-we should move on.
Y-you... ~name~, are you...?
~Name~? I-I know that's the ultimate purpose of this game, but... timing is everything, you know.
~Name~! W-what are... you didn't have to do that!
~Name~? You... understand the rules, right? Well... I suppose if you're enjoying yourself...
O-oh, ~player~. You're a-already...
~Name~, I... I'm sorry, I shouldn't be so... flustered...
Your ~clothing~... Quite alluring, ~name~. I like your style.
P-pardon me, ~name~. I didn't expect you'd lose your ~clothing~ before I even lost my sandals.
Don't compare yourself to me, ~name~. I'm doing much better than I thought I would!
Will you stay for another round, ~name~? You must know what that puts at risk.
Your ~clothing~ won't come to permanent harm. I assure you.
Aimee, what are you... oh. Oh, I see. Well... even with your skill, this is reckless.
What was... oh? Oh, I see. You've done this before. Still... can I ask you to refrain in the future?
Aimee, are you... mad? N-no... I... I'll admit, I don't... sense any danger, but...
O-oh! I... I hadn't realized you were wearing... erm...
Mahiru? Is that... comfortable? I... R-right. Next round?
O-oh, you... were you planning on...?
I should've guessed. If you don't mind my saying, it's cute, but... a bit sparse for my taste.
If nothing else, at least you're still behind the camera, Mahiru.
Oh! This is who... Well, hello, Marinette! Nice to formally meet you.
Oh, so this is what you look like under that costume! It's nice to properly meet you, Marinette.
Oh! I see. What... are you alright? The game isn't so important, you know...
Misato... you don't have to... but if you're ready, then... ~player~?
O-oh! Erm... N-Natsuki, perhaps your strategy was... flawed...
Natsuki, perhaps you should... oh, I suppose it's too late now.
E-erm... A-at least you're not... embarrassed.
Your erm... ~clothing~ covered up more than I'd anticipated...
Ngh - Th-that's... I didn't think it'd actually...
~name~... is that not... cumbersome? I suppose you can't help it...
That seems... unfortunate, ~name~. If not for you, then...
~Name~? I-I know that's the ultimate purpose of this game, but... timing is everything, you know.
~Name~! W-what are... you didn't have to do that!
~Name~? You... understand the rules, right? Well... I suppose if you're enjoying yourself...
~Name~! A-are you... ngh... I'm sorry, I... w-we should move on...
~Name~, your... erm... you're very... blessed...
Oh, ~name~ is going to remove her ~clothing~?
You shine with Farore's courage.
She's going to expose herself, and I've yet to lose my sandals. Perhaps I've already learned.
I didn't cheat! She simply didn't have luck on her side today.
You're going to see this through?
You should really think-
Aimee, I don't think-
This is a bad-
Don't get too excited; I think Amalia has a trick or two up her sleeve.
Still? Even with so little protection?
Surely ~clothing.ifPlural(simple ~clothing~ aren't|a simple ~clothing~ isn't)~ enough to protect you...?
Ngh! I'm sorry, it's just... startling. I'll be alright.
~name~, I don't... surely that's not a good idea, right ~player~?
R-really? Your ~clothing~ so soon? I... I suppose if that's your choice...
I'm sure everyone liked your ~clothing~, ~name~. Don't worry; there's no harm I can't avoid.
If anything happens to your ~clothing~, just come see me. I can undo anything.
Your ~clothing~? Not much of an offering, ~name~.
I just don't understand, ~name~. N-not that I'm complain- erm... I-I mean...
Goodbye, ~clothing~. Not that it really matters much, exposed as you already are.
Oh! I was wrong, then. It seems ~player~ is more bold than you were, Jura.
I... I was wrong? I was sure ~player~ would have a trick up his sleeve.
Oh! W-well... silly me, I suppose.
I've certainly seen men dress more... fancy...
I'm certain you won't miss your ~clothing~.
I don't think he's upset about losing his ~clothing~.
It wasn't much, but I won't complain.
Will you stay another round, ~name~?
Your ~clothing~ looked just fine. But I guess it's time to move on.
W-what? You can lose with such a good hand?
Y-you, ~player~? How can that hand lose?
You lost? We all had better hands?
I-I still don't know why you felt it wise to save your ~clothing~ for this long...
If you thought I'd go easy on you just for... well, you're wrong!
S-so, did you... bear yourself for one of us?
I'll admit, ~name~, the wisdom in your plan eludes me. I-I won't be so easily distracted by your -- erk!
See? It's only the smart move at this stage.
I knew it! Don't be too disappointed; I'm sure you have a prudent plan in place, too.
His ~clothing~ for your rapier. That's fair, isn't it?
Now that you mention it, Jura, I love ~player~'s ~clothing~. He dresses nicely... for a man.
Just as foreseen.
An excellent plan, ~name~. But I don't think that was your final loss.
So now that ~name~ has lost, he must...?
Surely if ~name~ didn't want you to see, he'd have simply left. R-right?
I've little need to observe such displays. Oracles are above these things.
If... if ~name~ can do that... then I can see this through.
~name~ is a-already... M-maybe this wasn't such a good idea...
If... if ~name~ can do that... then I can see this through.
~name~ is a-already... M-maybe this wasn't such a good idea...
If... if ~name~ can do that... then I can see this through.
~name~ is a-already... M-maybe this wasn't such a good idea...
Goodness, ~player~, is this why you chose ~name~ to play with us?
~name~ does seem to be... enjoying herself...
I'd thought that one person doing it was distracting.
D-don't let me interrupt your... bonding?
Should I have warned you, ~player~? I apologize.
I can't tell you what to keep, ~player~. That's cheating, remember?
~player~, you'll need to make it through this on your own.
Oh, ~player~ lost this time?
Don't get too excited, everyone. She's not a pushover.
~player~ lost! But just what has she lost?
Don't get discouraged, ~player~. I can play you a song, if you'd like.
I suppose I'll be... oh! ~player~? So I don't need a pair?
How unfortunate. Even a pair could have saved you.
I hope you tried your best, even if it didn't quite work out.
I see you didn't get very lucky this time. You'll stay another round, won't you?
What did you have, ~player~? Oh, I can see why that didn't carry you far.
I don't know what could've saved you, ~player~, and I certainly won't tell you which card it was.
I wanted to learn this game from you, ~player~. Perhaps I should just do what you don't.
~player~ lost. And with a pair, no less.
I think you'd be upset if you knew what your hand could've been, ~player~.
What an unforgiving game. A pair isn't enough, it seems.
Our hands were much the same, ~player~. What do the rules say about this?
We both had a pair? What does that mean?
So... what will you select first, ~player~?
I'd like to thank you for your choices this evening, ~player~. This might be more nerve-wracking with a man here.
She's done it. May the Goddess Nayru cover you, ~name~.
This, too, was unavoidable. Though I don't think that comforts you, ~name~.
~name~ has enough bravery for all of us!
That just- A-Aimee, I... I can't believe you're still standing!
Oh, my goodness! Are you okay? I can't believe that didn't hurt!
You're going to feel that later, aren't you? I can hardly believe it didn't hit... closer.
Quite a clever plan, Amalia. Maybe it will be enough to carry you to victory!
It's a good thing you won't be needing ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~ today...
W-well... erm... I suppose ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ didn't cover much...
You're not out of this race yet, Shima!
This is the last stretch, Shima. At least... it is for you.
~name~ must not be happy. I'm not nearly as... exposed as she is.
Shall we continue?
Let's give her some space, everyone.
That all seems a bit... rough...
You should consider... n-never mind. Whatever you enjoy, I suppose.
W-what? You'll both...?
O-oh... you'll have your friend help? I... I suppose if that's within the rules...
Oh! He's... quite invested. I suppose... that makes sense.
~name~ doesn't have a lot of options left...
You know what time it is, ~name~. So... what do you have left to choose from?
I'm certain you won't miss your ~clothing~.
I don't think she's upset about losing her ~clothing~.
It wasn't much, but I won't complain.
Oh, wonderful choice, ~name~! I love your ~clothing~.
Oh, your lovely ~clothing~? But... that's just the game, isn't it?
Your ~clothing~ looked just fine. But I guess it's time to move on.
Just the ~clothing~? That's fair, really. Next round?
Will you stay another round, ~name~?
O-oh... Perhaps that was inappropriate, given... present company.
Oh! I... I didn't expect that to be...
B-Blake! I... I see. Well... your secret is safe with me.
Welcome back, Florina! I'm very proud of you for returning. That shows your courage.
Are you well, Florina? Take your time; we can wait for you, if you'd like.
W-what? You can lose with such a good hand?
Y-you, ~player~? How can that hand lose?
You lost? We all had better hands?
It's strange, though; you don't seem any less capable now than before.
But I can sense it even now; you can still hold your own.
See? She's doing just fine. Revy, would you at least consider...
I'm glad you feel comfortable enough to disarm. Perhaps... that trend will continue.
I see your ~clothing~... is very important to you. It will be kept safe; you have my word.
I... I don't know what's wrong, Meia, but... I promise you, your ~clothing~ will be recovered safely.
W... what just...? You were supposed to...
I really liked your... your blazer... where did...?
Hmhm... but they looked marvelous.
I like them. they're a nice accessory; even for a man.
(Don't worry, ~player~. I don't sense any intent to depart. She's only nervous.)
You'll leave so soon, Natsuki? But we've only just started!
Oh, good. See? There's no need for weapons in a place like this.
It's certainly unorthodox, but I suppose if it's... safe...
Hahaha! I see! My, how unusual. You're almost like a spirit, aren't you?
I'm sorry, it's hard to remember that we're playing a game. This is all so peculiar - even for me!
Perhaps I should play more games with spirits. Though... poes aren't usually much for recreation.
Well, now that your ~clothing~ have erm... exploded... it's time for the next hand.
Are you okay? This is taking a lot out of you, isn't it? We can rest if you need to!
Shima? You seem... off. I know you like going fast, but maybe it's time to take a moment.
Did that one hurt? Shima, you should really consider taking it easy.
I assure you, I've had enough experience with spirits to beware what they're capable of.
Why wouldn't we find you frightful? Any manner of spirit can be quite dangerous.
He's... I'm n-not surprised. Just... perhaps we ought to continue.
Good choice, ~name~!
He's ready. To continue, I mean. Let us move forward.
~name~ is rather... exposed, isn't he?
Oh, my! Jura, whatever you've done to convince him... it must've been quite effective.
E-erm... ~player~, have you... Oh, yes, I'm sure you're pleased, Jura. Are you so easily seduced, ~name~?
Perhaps we should let ~name~... concentrate.
Ngh...~name~, it seems you have no problem... accomodating the others.
~player~... I trust you didn't expect this outcome...?
You couldn't have known this would happen, ~player~.
I... suppose you should enjoy yourself, ~player~. If you don't mind us continuing without you.
I don't know if I wanted to do this well...
I must be doing a bit too well...
With ~name~ out of the game... that only leaves the two of us.
Oh, he's just... I-I knew what this game entailed, but to see it with my own...
Th-there must be a first man out, ~name~.
~name~ is the first to... n-no, I'm not enamored. I can control myself.
I've seen Ralph like this many times. This... feels different, though.
I trust you're not ashamed, ~name~. For good reason.
N-Nine? Is... is that normal?
Wait... you don't have...?
Data port...? What are... I-I do, I assure you, but...
Eh? M-My species? Erm... I-I mean, I do, but...
O-oh, ~player~... I... I'm glad you brought me here for this...
~player~! You look... good. I... I... should get back to the game...
I certainly like what I see, ~player~.
Mmmh... Din, give me strength...
N-Nayru guide me... (I must control myself...)
See, ~name~? There was no reason to expose yourself too soon.
Th-that was fast, ~player~. Did you run out of options so soon?
~player~, did you truly not have more tricks up your sleeve? Or was this... well, she did come here to learn about men...
I... I think I see why ~player~ asked you to join us.
You've been blessed by the goddess, ~name~.
~name~ couldn't have changed anything. This round held little for him.
Perhaps if you had instead traded... no, my apologies. Such knowledge is often a burden.
All our hands are relative. We can't all win.
I was right! Not that you're happy about that, right ~name~?
You can't give up, ~name~! You must see what the future has in store for you.
There must always be one, ~name~.
I'm sorry, but I cannot give you a second try. The game would go nowhere.
Wait a moment... two losses? I erm... P-perhaps I should check something...
You lost twice? A-are you... are you sure? Hmm...
Might I suggest you set aside your armor? I can assure you, you won't need it.
It doesn't look like that armor of yours helps in poker. It might be a good item to remove.
Oh, I'd hardly realized; our hair! We all match! How interesting.
Oh! Is it very common to have blue hair around here? I've never met anyone else like me.
~name~, please... I do wish you'd have chosen against bringing a weapon here.
May I ask that you disarm, ~name~? Surely there's little need for it here.
Oh. Should I have warned you that a pair wouldn't suffice?
Don't be upset, ~name~. There was nothing you could've done.
I suppose your hand just wasn't enough this time.
9S? How do you sense your cards with a blindfold on?
P-perhaps you should consider taking off your blindfold. C-can you see your cards?
Oh! Are you... oh. No, it's quite alright. You simply... remind me of someone I know. ~name~, is it?
Oh, ~name~! You're here, too? Wait a moment... my apologies. I confused you for... a good friend of mine.
Don't be so upset, Link. Still, it's good to actually hear you speak.
Oh, good. I was wondering why you were behaving so strangely. My Link had no problem speaking his mind.
Since ~name~ lost, does she have to...?
I'm sorry, ~name~, but you must know the forfeit. Don't feel as though you must.
I've little need to observe such displays. Oracles are above these things.
It would be a poor plan to give you another try, ~name~.
If... if ~name~ can do that... then I can see this through.
~name~ is a-already... M-maybe this wasn't such a good idea...
If... if ~name~ can do that... then I can see this through.
~name~ is a-already... M-maybe this wasn't such a good idea...
If... if ~name~ can do that... then I can see this through.
~name~ is a-already... M-maybe this wasn't such a good idea...
Should I have warned you, ~player~? I apologize.
I can't tell you what to keep, ~player~. That would be unfair.
~player~, you'll need to make it through this on your own.
Oh, ~player~ lost this time?
Don't get too excited, everyone. He can take care of himself.
~player~ lost! But just what has he lost?
Don't get discouraged, ~player~. I can play you a song, if you'd like.
I thought you were supposed to teach me some tricks, ~player~.
What poor fortune. You can still recover, right ~player~?
Oh, no! What happened, ~player~?
I suppose I'll be... oh! ~player~? So I don't need a pair?
How unfortunate. Even a pair could have saved you.
What can you say, ~player~? Surely you didn't expect that to save you.
Oh... I thought you would've kept your... never mind.
Our hands were much the same, ~player~. What do the rules say about this?
We both had a pair? What does that mean?
~player~ lost. And with a pair, no less.
I think you'd be upset if you knew what your hand could've been, ~player~.
What an unforgiving game. A pair isn't enough, it seems.
Oh, your cards are so good, ~player~! So... who lost?
Are you sure you've lost, ~player~? You had a... no, two! Two pairs?
What an interesting outcome. Don't you agree, ~player~?
To think, all the safety those four cards afforded you...
P-please, Jura. I doubt if ~player~ will start with something too revealing...
The game's only just started, Jura. I doubt if ~player~ will leap straight to something big.
Don't get too excited, Jura. I suspect he'll start much like you did.
Well... remember, you started with your sword, Jura. Perhaps ~player~ is a tease, too.
It only - oh. That's only... no, my apologies. Don't mind me.
It's strange; I can only faintly sense... oh! D-don't mind me.
~Name~? I-I know that's the ultimate purpose of this game, but... timing is everything, you know.
~Name~! W-what are... you didn't have to do that!
~Name~? You... understand the rules, right? Well... I suppose if you're enjoying yourself...
To think, you not only bared it all, but asked us here to bear witness in the first place...
I don't find anything funny; your bravery speaks volume, ~player~.
At least you still have some safety at hand.
What will you do now, ~name~?
Would anyone mind a song while we wait?
Only a fool seeks safety in cards.
I-I guess it's finally time for your ~clothing~ to come off, isn't it?
Consider carefully what you'll remove first, ~name~.
Don't be upset if ~name~ doesn't start with something big.
What do you think ~name~ will start with? I have a guess...
Tch! That's not... shall we just move on?
~name~ is done. We should move on.
Take your time, ~name~. You can rest while we move on.
He's... finished. I suppose ~name~'s earned a rest.
~name~ has officially lost. But... I don't think he minds.
W-well, he... h-he... he's made no mess? Erm...
You look beautiful, ~name~. Are you a dancer?
Be confident, ~name~. You have nothing to fear.
Don't feel bad, ~name~. ~player~ asked for you by name!
You've the heart of a lioness, Natsuki. Be proud.
Your bravery is not lost on us, I assure you.
It's a good thing you won't be needing ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~ today...
W-well... erm... I suppose ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ didn't cover much...
This may not look good... but promise you won't give up!
My apologies for allowing this outcome. I think it's best to let lots fall as they may.
You look fine, ~name~. But would you still like to continue?
I didn't expect to do so well. ~name~ is just having an off day.
You don't regret your decision to play with us, do you?
I must be doing exceptionally! Oh, but... I'm sorry, ~name~. Don't worry; you aren't out of this yet!
You're certainly comely, ~name~. Be sure to cherish that.
Aimee! Are you okay?
Aimee! You... you cut it a bit close, didn't you?
W-what? Joetta... how in the world...?
You ah... you're rather... small for a Great Fairy... aren't you?
I see now. You are a bit too small to be a Great Fairy...
I predict the loss of ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~... hmhm... perhaps I shouldn't spoil anything.
You can take your time choosing. Maybe a song would help...?
Don't overthink it.
What will you choose?
I've heard tales of a song that could turn day to night. But... you can imagine I have little use for such a thing...
One song has always eluded me; they say only the winds can play the tune properly. But how can one conduct the wind?
Oh, you'll all love this one! All the forest animals can't help but come running when they hear it. Even some horses show up!
I think you're worrying too much, Blake. Your bow is cute, but surely you won't miss it that much.
You have a cute bow, Blake, but if you're so worried, I promise I can keep it safe.
Don't worry, ~player~. She's only so nervous because you're here, anyway.
Don't try and chase her, ~player~. You're the reason she's fled, anyway.
Let her go, ~player~. It's only nerves.
Florina! Oh, no. I was hoping... oh. Never mind; here she comes again.
I should thank you for setting your sword aside, really.
Thank you, Jura. I hope everyone feels a bit safer.
Just the ~clothing~? That's fair, really. N-next...
Don't worry, erm... Ping. Your bracers are perfectly manly.
Oh! H-how... erm... befitting a man of courage. R-right, ~player~?
Shima, are you... oh. You're okay. Thank the goddess.
Gasp! Are you...?
Ngh! Is that not... painful?
That was a close one. Are you alright?
No matter how many times I see it, it always surprises me.
Even though I know better, it's hard to believe that doesn't hurt.
Thank you for that. Weapons make me rather... uneasy.
Thank you for your consideration, Spooky. There's no need for a weapon here, anyway.
Oh, good. I'm glad. We... aren't all departed, Spooky.
I've met one who shared your name and status. It seems... there were many.
Of all of the many Zeldas I've heard of... I've yet to meet one who partook in these sorts of displays.
That's the spirit, princess!
Exactly! I should've known you'd be free from the trappings of most royalty.
I won? I'm sorry, everybody; I thought I was being fair. You aren't upset, are you?
Thank goodness that's over. Please, clean yourselves up.
Wait a moment...that means I've won? Already? I... I promise, I didn't use my power!
I can hardly believe it. Of all the ways this game could have gone...

Do show me more of what you're working with.
You have an Oracle to impress! Show us your best!
Don't think too hard; you won't spare yourself any embarrassment. Hmhmm...
What offering will you give us?
We eagerly await your decision, ~name~.
You can take your time deciding, ~name~. I can wait for ages.
What do you think is coming off next?
I think I may be warming up to this part of the game. But... take your time, ~name~. I won't go anywhere.
Would you like me to help you along?
I can speed things up, if you'd like. It won't hurt. For long.
Is that all you have to show me? What cowardice!
What an awful deficit I've been left.
Nayru, you truly are the greatest handicap...
But not by much, it seems.
There are plenty of rounds to go, ~name~.
I'm certain you won't miss your ~clothing~.
I don't think she's upset about losing her ~clothing~.
Will you stay another round, ~name~?
Oh, wonderful choice, ~name~! I love your ~clothing~.
Oh, but your ~clothing~ is lovely! But... I guess that's just the game, isn't it?
Your ~clothing~ looked just fine. But I guess it's time to move on.
Huh? Your... your ears!
Oh, so is that what you were hiding? How... interesting.
Oh ho. Well... this is unexpected.
Oh! Oh, my. I'm sorry, Blake. I should've known.
I... I see. Don't worry, Blake. Your secret is safe with me.
Oh! Well... I think they're adorable, Blake. I don't care what anyone else says.
Oh? Hmm... perhaps I was too hasty. What's this I sense?
Come now, it's not as though... oh... oh, I see now. How interesting.
Ohh, how interesting. Not bad, not bad... Ping.
Oh, is that it? Hmhmm... Oh, what manly bracers those were. Such a strong man... almost makes my legs weak.
Hmhm... but they looked marvelous.
I like them. they're a nice accessory; even for a man.
You'll leave so soon, Natsuki? But we've only just started!
If you insist, Natsuki. We won't try to stop you.
Yes, I suppose it would be for the best if you departed. This is hardly the place for children.
Good, good, I doubt someone your age should be here anyway.
I expected only madness when you claimed to be a vessel. If nothing else, at least you're cute.
I'm glad you don't disappoint.
You may well be mad, but that's never stopped me before.
It's certainly unorthodox, but I suppose if it's... safe...
Hahaha! I see! My, how unusual. You're almost like a spirit, aren't you?
I'm sorry, it's hard to remember that we're playing a game. This is all so peculiar - even for me!
Perhaps I should play more games with spirits. Though... poes aren't usually much for recreation.
Well, now that your ~clothing~ have erm... exploded... it's time for the next hand.
Are you okay? This is taking a lot out of you, isn't it? We can rest if you need to!
Shima? You seem... off. I know you like going fast, but maybe it's time to take a moment.
Did that one hurt? Shima, you should really consider taking it easy.
(Snicker) Oh, don't worry your pretty little head; I'm sure we're all simply terrified.
I wonder what power your soul might offer. It's a shame Nayru's fresh out of bottles.
I assure you, I've had enough experience with spirits to beware what they're capable of.
Why wouldn't we find you frightful? Any manner of spirit can be quite dangerous.
Ohh, how ravishing. Even Nayru approves, though she'd never say it.
Impressive. Maybe you aren't useless after all.
Very well, ~name~. I suppose you've earned yourself another chance.
A worthy effort.
~name~'s... erm... You look good.
Quite pleasant, ~name~. I trust you're still having fun.
Yes! Give me that which I've earned!
Don't dare hold back, ~name~. We eagerly await your performance.
Perhaps this, too, is just a part of the game.
He... certainly wasted no time.
Don't let me keep you, ~name~.
Oh, it's finally time. Yes, yes... you'll do quite nicely.
Ravishing!
Don't hide yourself. Give us a good look...
We should really get to know each other better, ~name~. I think we'd get along swimmingly.
~name~... I'm glad I joined this game...
Okay, ~name~. You have my attention.
Oh? Your chest... I think your creators have forgotten something.
Gorons... are much like rocks, only not quite so clever. Are you certain there's no relation?
Wait... you don't have...?
N-Nine? Is... is that normal?
We should really get to know each other better, ~name~. I think we'd get along swimmingly.
~name~... I'm glad you asked me here...
Okay, ~name~. You have my attention.
Simply divine! You must let me -- Nayru! I don't need your condemnation now!
Hmhm... so, what will you do upon leaving this establishment? Nayru, please mind your own business.
I see you lack for nothing...
Is it still pleasant for you to cut loose? Surely they must be... burdensome.
Further proof that you can't best me, ~name~. You could always forfeit, you know.
Suffer defeat! Know despair!
Another has faltered before me. Is this all you can offer?
Surely you can do better.
The cards have chosen you, ~name~. Don't disappoint.
~name~ couldn't have changed anything. This round held little for him.
I was right! Not that you're happy about that, right ~name~?
You can't give up, ~name~! You must see what the future has in store for you.
Perhaps if you had instead traded... no, my apologies. Such knowledge is often a burden.
There must always be one, ~name~.
All our hands are relative. We can't all win.
I'm sorry, but I cannot give you a second try. The game would go nowhere.
It's about time! I'd accuse you of cheating, but we'd already know if you had.
Ha! You've shown your weakness; you may as well give up now!
Excellent! Just what I needed.
Finally! I've been anticipating this moment.
Hahaha! Another falls before the skill of Veran!
Take your time, ~name~; I won't miss a single moment.
W-wait... ~name~ lost again?
~name~ lost? That means she'll have to...
~name~? So she'll be... performing?
~player~? It's about time! Show me something good!
No, no, do take your time, ~player~. I'll savor the anticipation.
Hmhmm... Get used to defeat, ~player~.
Kneel before my- ngh... What? Nayru, must you bother me now?
I trust you aren't a fool when it comes to stripping, at least. Choose very carefully.
I'm sorry for your loss, ~player~, but I'm happy I don't have to progress further.
Should I have warned you, ~player~? I apologize.
I can't tell you what to keep, ~player~. That would be unfair.
~player~, you'll need to make it through this on your own.
Oh, ~player~ lost this time?
Don't get too excited, everyone. He can take care of himself.
~player~ lost! But just what has he lost?
Don't get discouraged, ~player~. I can play you a song, if you'd like.
What? What gives? What am I supposed to do with that?
Huh? What's that? Surely you don't expect...?
Don't look at me! Even my magic can only do so much.
I don't think you should be embarrassed, ~name~. There's a time and place for everything.
Oh! Er... I... I don't need to look, ~name~. Not that there's... n-never mind me.
You erm... Hmm hmm... You're certainly eager.
What a surprise. I don't know if it's bravery or... something else...
Oh! How bold of -- Huh? Oh... how incredibly bold of you.
Hmm... on the one hand, I'm unimpressed. But on the other, you're quite eager.
And why were you so quick to show me this?
I don't think you should be embarrassed, ~name~. There's a time and place for everything.
Oh! Er... I... I don't need to look, ~name~. Not that there's... n-never mind me.
What? What gives? What am I supposed to do with that?
Huh? What's that? Surely you don't expect...?
Don't look at me! Even my magic can only do so much.
Ohh... you. We simply must speak after this game is done.
Not half bad. Perhaps I should learn that trick.
Oh! But you're still... how peculiar!
I... I don't know why you'd do that, but... Not bad.
Make your choice carefully.
Don't disappoint me.
You've been given a chance to impress me. Don't waste it.
With that, you're brought ever closer to me.
I like your ~clothing~. I hope that's not what you choose next.
What will you do now, ~name~?
Would anyone mind a song while we wait?
You won't find safety in cards, ~name~.
Finally down to just your ~clothing~? Well... it's not as though you used it very well...
O-oh, are you just now taking off your ~clothing~? It's hardly more than a formality at this point.
Just go through the motions, darling. I already have all I need.
Oh, just your ~clothing~ left? I'm glad you saved it for last.
What? You're stopping? Did I say you could stop?!
Ugh! Could you not even keep it up for a little while longer?
Well... I would have preferred more. But for your show, I'll forgive your paltry endurance.
Hmhmhmm... you'll do just fine. You'll know when I have need of you.
Oh! ~name~, you... I... erm...
How... energetic, ~name~.
So much... what a mess. We... should really clean that up.
What? After all that...? You don't even...
W-well, he... h-he... he's made no mess? Erm...
Beauty is in the eye of the beholder. I'll just have to get a closer look, it seems.
Well, aren't you fun?
What? Darling, please take your things and come back when you're grown up.
I think you're beautiful, ~name~. We can't all be the same size or shape.
You're only out of this game if you want to be. You can still win!
You almost remind me of Din. Funny, isn't it?
You've the heart of a lioness, Natsuki. Be proud.
Your bravery is not lost on us, I assure you.
Hmm... perhaps it's not a total waste. Inferior, nevertheless.
Oh, is that all? Perhaps you could have foregone the bra altogether.
It's a good thing you won't be needing ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~ today...
W-well... erm... I suppose ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ didn't cover much...
This may not look good... but promise you won't give up!
My apologies for allowing this outcome. I think it's best to let lots fall as they may.
Just what I'm after! Oh, Nayru, why would you want to avert your gaze?
Even Queen Nambi couldn't hold a candle to you!
Your bravery only adds to your beauty.
I hope it feels good to be free, ~name~. There should be no shame here.
Just like that, ~name~! We're here to have fun!
What? You nearly struck yourself!
Ngh! I thought you had skill! What was that?
Aimee! Are you okay?
Aimee! You... you cut it a bit close, didn't you?
Hmm... I'm intrigued. And pleasantly surprised. Perhaps you aren't as irritating as I thought.
Joey? How... how did you manage that trick? Magic?
Make your choice carefully.
Don't disappoint me.
May I suggest that you make your decision soon? I do grow antsy quickly...
Hmm... it seems that you still have your ~clothing~. But you wouldn't make that mistake, would you?
Why do I get the feeling you're going to disappoint me?
With that, you're brought ever closer to me.
I like your ~clothing~. I hope that's not what you choose next.
What will you do now, ~name~?
Would anyone mind a song while we wait?
You won't find safety in cards, ~name~.
Anything small left, ~name~?
Do hurry up; no need to lord your lead over us!
Hmm... is your bow truly so important to you? Really?
It's hardly a ribbon; hurry it up! It's not like you're as exposed as us!
Well... I do wish I'd done better, but you don't need to worry about your bow too much.
Is something wrong, Blake? As cute as your bow is, I don't think it's worth such...concern.
Tch. What a hollow victory.
Meaningless! What purpose could such a device serve?
There's something off about you. Something...
Hmm... (But what could it be?)
Don't worry, erm... Ping. Your bracers are perfectly manly.
Oh! H-how... erm... befitting a man of courage. R-right, ~player~?
What?! Are you... What's happening?!
Ngh! Did you just... what are you, a dodongo?!
Shima, are you... oh. You're okay. Thank the goddess.
Gasp! Are you...?
Outstanding!
Hahahaha! How wonderful!
Ngh! Is that not... painful?
That was a close one. Are you alright?
No matter how many times I see it, it always surprises me.
Even though I know better, it's hard to believe that doesn't hurt.
What's the purpose of bringing a knife if you're going to drop it at the first sign of trouble? Ugh!
Oh, what a shame. I was hoping to see what you could do with it.
Hmm... I wonder, do poes feel pain?
Thank you for that. Weapons make me rather... uneasy.
Thank you for your consideration, Spooky. There's no need for a weapon here, anyway.
Oh, good. I'm glad. We... aren't all departed, Spooky.
Haha! Did you really think you could stand up to the great Veran? Know your place!
I've only won by the skin of my teeth, it seems. Still, a victory is a victory; thank you for playing, everybody!
Shame will only slow you down; cast it off, and show us what we came for.
I see your ~clothing~. I see few other options.
Is it time for ~name~ to finally lose her ~clothing~? I do certainly hope so.
What offering will you give us?
I'm looking forward to seeing what you choose next.
You have so few items left to sacrifice. Do you truly wish to continue?
You're approaching the end of this road, ~name~.
Choose carefully, ~name~.
It looks like you're getting down to my level! N-not that you're happy to hear that.

state.i: If you think you can strike me down so easily, you...

case.state: I am beyond your feeble weaponry! Take your best...
(Just hold still, Nayru. That... will keep you safe.)
N-no sudden movements!
Ladybug? What's...?
What? Is this magic? Ladybug, what are you...?
Oh? What's this?
What sort of sorcery is this?
Oh, please do take your time. It isn't like we're going anywhere.
Is it truly so shameful? You aren't even as exposed as we are!
There's no hurry, Misato. I can feel your trepidation... whatever it is, take your time. Please.
How much longer can you keep up this sham, I wonder?
For shame, trying to fool us all. Fortunately for you, I can think of a way to make this right.
Is it already that time? Well, good luck... Ping.
You've made a valiant effort, Ping. But it seems like you've no other option.
How sensible. What a clever way to use your... erm... faculties.
Clever! I should use a technique like that. Only, I suppose I'm not quite... suited for it.
Oh? And you think that will spare you any embarrassment?
Why, that almost seems clever.
There's no need to fret. I erm... I believe you.
Not to worry, Natsuki. I quite like your... erm... style.
Is that so? Perhaps I've read you wrong after all.
In truth? Oh, do tell.
You don't have much left to protect you. Erm... n-not from our eyes, but... oh, never mind.
I trust you're okay with continuing?
I think I'm growing accustomed to this. It's... almost like fireworks!
Do show me more of what you're working with.
You have an oracle to impress! Show us your best!
Don't think too hard; you won't spare yourself any embarrassment. Hmhmm...
And now, for my reward...
Oh, but you must have a plan in place. Surely that will save you.
We eagerly await your decision, ~name~.
You can take your time deciding, ~name~. I can wait for ages.
What do you think is coming off next?
I think I may be warming up to this part of the game. But... take your time, ~name~. I won't go anywhere.
Finally down to just your ~clothing~? Well... it's not as though you used it very well...
O-oh, are you just now taking off your ~clothing~? It's hardly more than a formality at this point.
Just go through the motions, darling. I already have all I need.
Oh, just your ~clothing~ left? I'm glad you saved it for last.
Yesss... now stew in your own mess for a while.
Oh, how I long for just... Next game, I'm playing without you, Nayru!
There we go! She's done. Now... she can clean up, right?
That looks s-ngh! N-never mind me.
Oh. And after all your skillful display, you have to go and injure yourself. I hope your aim is still steady.
She'll be fine, Nayru. Even if you went back, there's nothing you could do to stop her.
Aimee! Are you okay?
Gasp! You've been hit! I knew this was a bad idea!
What a wondrous use of that camera.
Brilliant! How could I have never considered that?
You know, darling, I think I'll be needing that picture.
W-was that a good idea? You want to remember that?
Erm... h-how often do you use your camera for... this?
I-I don't know if you want to remember...!
The worst is over, ~name~. Now, then... shall we continue? It should be easier to focus now.
Is this it? Is she out of buffers? Haha!
I'm always eager to observe beauty. You don't seem like you'll disappoint, ~name~.
I get the feeling you're finally moving on to something worth my time.
I've been waiting to see what you can offer.
You'll do great, ~name~. Just think of it like changing your ~clothing~.
There's nothing to fear, ~name~. You have only your embarrassment to lose.
You're r-really down to... w-well...
Take a deep breath, and let it loose. Don't let fear stop you.
Oh? Even with nothing to protect you, still you persist?
It's about time! I was afraid everyone here was a coward.
A-are you sure this is still a good idea? I-I mean... you have no protection...
There is power in brevity, I suppose... but I don't understand why you... ohh...
I... I'm sorry, have I missed something? I agree, there's value in being concise, but... oh... I see...
Are you ashamed? Well... I suppose I can see why.
My, but you're on edge, aren't you? I don't know why; there's nothing there to disappoint us anyway.
Oh! Well... I'm glad you're still with us.
Oh? If you're uncomfortable, you don't have to continue. We won't be upset; right, ~player~?
Can't stand going first, can you? What a shame.
Oh, do test me. I still need to see where my limits are within this accursed place.
Still? Even with so little protection?
Surely ~clothing.ifPlural(a simple ~clothing~ isn't|simple ~clothing~ aren't)~ enough to protect you...?
Ngh! I'm sorry, it's just... startling. I'll be alright.
More, more! Don't give up now, ~name~!
Gaze upon me! Show me everything you have!
Slower now, ~name~. I must savor this.
Faster, ~name~! Hold my attention.
Do not avert your gaze. I can feel her... excitement!
Perhaps... I'll remember this moment.
~name~ is still going. I don't think it's bravery that drives him onward.
~name~, you... perhaps shouldn't stare. I... certainly wasn't.
~name~, don't... (don't stop...)
He's being quite... distracting, isn't he?
Next time, I'm starting the game out!
How curious that you feel safe enough to choose your ~clothing~...
Hmmhm... It may be insignificant, but it's now out of your hands.
Oh, I can fault you for this, and I do. But you'll still fall before me. Enjoy this time while it lasts.
You dare waste my time? Who do you think you are?
A pitiful display of cowardice! Why did I wait so long?
Your judgement was sound, ~name~. That doesn't mean I'm happy about it.
I'm so very far behind, aren't I? I should be performing better.
And you're only now losing the ~clothing~? I... I don't know what to say.
There was once a girl whose ~clothing~ protected her from suddenly bursting into flames. Funny, right?
Once I met a girl who burst into flames just after losing her ~clothing~. Oh, but I'm sure you're safe.
You're fun.
You should show me that trick, Aimee. I'm sure I can devise a spell close enough to your... weapon.
Truly, Nayru, only you would want to ask her to stop. It's perfectly safe!
Aimee, surely there's a better way to strip than using a weapon.
Aimee, you can take your time in the future. P-please.
I... I suppose I can recover your clothing intact, if you will it. But... it would be easier if you didn't destroy it.
Eh? So that's it? A scar. Well... I suppose your concern makes sense. It's still silly, though.
How comely. No, no, I quite like the look, really.
I won't berate her! Gracious, I'm the one who likes darkness.
Kyoko... wh... when did that happen to you?
Don't be ashamed, Kyoko. We all have our scars; some more evident than others.
You could have kept your gloves on all game, Kyoko. I applaud your bravery.
See? I'm harmless. I'd hardly hurt a fairy.
See? Nothing. I can restrain myself.
If you need a moment to think, just let me know! I'd be delighted to lend a hand.
I'm sure I can do the same for you!
Someone as adorable as you brightens this game more than you know.
You're more adorable than Farore. But I suppose it's for the best that your similarities end there.
I should be glad you're staying, really; an adorable thing like you could make ~player~'s day.
Perhaps I could come to appreciate your presence. Or at least overlook you.
I'm sorry, it's hard to remember that we're playing a game. This is all so peculiar - even for me!
Perhaps I should play more games with spirits. Though... poes aren't usually much for recreation.
Well, now that your ~clothing~ have erm... exploded... it's time for the next hand.
Are you finally out of fluff? Good!
Oh, I don't think ~name~ can stall any more.
Here we go, Nayru. This is what you've been waiting for, too.
What does he have left to... o-oh. Well...
Ha! I think ~name~ is nearly beaten! Now just to...
Is it that time already? I... P-please, don't mind me...
Is it that time already? Marvelous.
I-I should be glad that I'm keeping up, but...
Ha! You should all think about what you'll lose.
Don't think for a moment you can best this.
Let your hopes be shrouded in darkness!
No, no; don't you dare give up this hand. Show me your very best.
Oh, please. You'll lose, yes, but show me your very best in the meantime.
Oh, yes. I haven't forgotten you, "Nine". You aren't quite human... are you some sort of stunted goron?
"Upgrade"? Why, I do like the sound of that. I like you already, odd little man.
"Healing"? Don't be absurd; why would I ever harm such a delicate flower?
Oh, can you heal wounds, Aella? Well... that will surely come in handy.
Well, well... someone's feisty. Yes, I am Veran, and you... scarcely know what you're getting into.
Someone's fearless, I see. I am Veran, and you... may yet be of some amusement.
Nayru? Darling, sleepy Nayru's taken a short nap. But you... I quite like you.
You may call me Veran, if you so insist. But my, you are quite ravishing.
Oh, yes. The spacegirl? Quite exquisite; and I'm sure you're delighted with what Nayru predicted. Poor thing.
"Hurt" Nayru? Silly girl, why would I ever hurt Nayru? I'm here at her behest!
"Hurt" the Oracle of Ages? If she comes to any harm, my dream of eternal darkness will forever elude my grasp! I wouldn't dream of it.
Oh, you won't let me? I see. And... what manner of magic do you possess?
A pirate, calling me unpleasant? Why, I'm flattered.
You should know, little sky-pirate; flattery will carry you far.
Oh, right. The hapless little fairy. Poor thing must be so confused. Go on back to your master, why don't you?
Ah, yes, I'd nearly forgotten; who let a fairy in here, anyway?
That sounds like just the thing we need! What sort of drinks can you offer?
What sort of drinks are you...? I-I mean... it wouldn't be a good idea to...
An "abyssal", hmm? I do quite like the sound of that. The Abyssal Queen... what do you think, Nayru?
An "abyssal"? Finally, the respect I deserve! Perhaps I've misread you, girl.
Oh, really? You won't let me? And what will you do, make me weightless?
You won't let me, will you, miss gravity? Dare strike at me, and you'll only hurt Nayru.
You intend to stop me? Well... unless you can conjure mystical seeds out of thin air, good luck.
There's no need to stop me, fool; Nayru could take control at any time. (A hundred hexes upon this place...)
No one can escape time.
I think I can relax.
As if blessed by the goddess.
I've drawn success from chaos. Just another day for an oracle.
I wish I'd held these sooner. Timing is everything.
I couldn't stand to watch poor Nayru suffer so. I'm sure I can perform better than she did.
I hope you've enjoyed your victories thus far: they end now!
This had better pull through, or someone is going to pay.
That's what I get for expecting anything of cards.
I don't put my faith in trinkets, Nayru. Especially playing cards.
I'd be less upset with these cards if Nayru could've kept more than her unmentionables on.
Is this truly your offering? I've given away better!

This will suffice for now.
What? I thought this was...
I've done more with less.
This should be enough.
I wonder what will happen next. Don't you, ~player~?
I thought it about time I joined the fun! Besides, Nayru needs me.
Don't expect me to fall apart like Nayru did. Poor darling hardly knows a heart from a spade.
I demand ~cards~; now!
~cards~ more; and they'd better be an improvement!
Grr... fine, Nayru, I'll obey your rules. ~cards~, quickly.
I don't have many options. ~cards~!
Why can't I conjure these things myself? Ugh. ~cards~, then.
I'll take ~cards~ this time.
I'll need ~cards~ more.
~cards~ sounds like just what I need.

I'm not too worried. Still... it would be wise to trade... ~cards~.
Hahaha! I've returned!
Now is when things get interesting!

This is just pitiful! I demand another attempt!
You won't get the last laugh!

Oh? Your chest... I think your creators have forgotten something.
Gorons... are much like rocks, only not quite so clever. Are you certain there's no relation?
Wait... you don't have...?
N-Nine? Is... is that normal?
We should really get to know each other better, ~name~. I think we'd get along swimmingly.
~name~... I'm glad you asked me here...
Okay, ~name~. You have my attention.
Simply divine! You must let me -- Nayru! I don't need your condemnation now!
Hmhm... so, what will you do upon leaving this establishment? Nayru, please mind your own business.
I see you lack for nothing...
Is it still pleasant for you to cut loose? Surely they must be... burdensome.
Further proof that you can't best me, ~name~. You could always forfeit, you know.
Suffer defeat! Know despair!
Another has faltered before me. Is this all you can offer?
Surely you can do better.
The cards have chosen you, ~name~. Don't disappoint.
~name~ couldn't have changed anything. This round held little for him.
I was right! Not that you're happy about that, right ~name~?
You can't give up, ~name~! You must see what the future has in store for you.
Perhaps if you had instead traded... no, my apologies. Such knowledge is often a burden.
There must always be one, ~name~.
All our hands are relative. We can't all win.
I'm sorry, but I cannot give you a second try. The game would go nowhere.
It's about time! I'd accuse you of cheating, but we'd already know if you had.
Ha! You've shown your weakness; you may as well give up now!
Excellent! Just what I needed.
Finally! I've been anticipating this moment.
Hahaha! Another falls before the skill of Veran!
Take your time, ~name~; I won't miss a single moment.
W-wait... ~name~ lost again?
~name~ lost? That means she'll have to...
~name~? So she'll be... performing?
~player~? It's about time! Show me something good!
No, no, do take your time, ~player~. I'll savor the anticipation.
Hmhmm... Get used to defeat, ~player~.
Kneel before my- ngh... What? Nayru, must you bother me now?
I trust you aren't a fool when it comes to stripping, at least. Choose very carefully.
I'm sorry for your loss, ~player~, but I'm happy I don't have to progress further.
Should I have warned you, ~player~? I apologize.
I can't tell you what to keep, ~player~. That would be unfair.
~player~, you'll need to make it through this on your own.
Oh, ~player~ lost this time?
Don't get too excited, everyone. He can take care of himself.
~player~ lost! But just what has he lost?
Don't get discouraged, ~player~. I can play you a song, if you'd like.
Well, ~player~? What will you choose?
What? What gives? What am I supposed to do with that?
Huh? What's that? Surely you don't expect...?
Don't look at me! Even my magic can only do so much.
I don't think you should be embarrassed, ~name~. There's a time and place for everything.
Oh! Er... I... I don't need to look, ~name~. Not that there's... n-never mind me.
You erm... Hmm hmm... You're certainly eager.
What a surprise. I don't know if it's bravery or... something else...
Oh! How bold of -- Huh? Oh... how incredibly bold of you.
Hmm... on the one hand, I'm unimpressed. But on the other, you're quite eager.
And why were you so quick to show me this?
I don't think you should be embarrassed, ~name~. There's a time and place for everything.
Oh! Er... I... I don't need to look, ~name~. Not that there's... n-never mind me.
What? What gives? What am I supposed to do with that?
Huh? What's that? Surely you don't expect...?
Don't look at me! Even my magic can only do so much.
Ohh... you. We simply must speak after this game is done.
Not half bad. Perhaps I should learn that trick.
Oh! But you're still... how peculiar!
I... I don't know why you'd do that, but... Not bad.
Make your choice carefully.
Don't disappoint me.
You've been given a chance to impress me. Don't waste it.
With that, you're brought ever closer to me.
I like your ~clothing~. I hope that's not what you choose next.
What will you do now, ~name~?
Would anyone mind a song while we wait?
You won't find safety in cards, ~name~.
Finally down to just your ~clothing~? Well... it's not as though you used it very well...
O-oh, are you just now taking off your ~clothing~? It's hardly more than a formality at this point.
Just go through the motions, darling. I already have all I need.
Oh, just your ~clothing~ left? I'm glad you saved it for last.
What? You're stopping? Did I say you could stop?!
Ugh! Could you not even keep it up for a little while longer?
Well... I would have preferred more. But for your show, I'll forgive your paltry endurance.
Hmhmhmm... you'll do just fine. You'll know when I have need of you.
Oh! ~name~, you... I... erm...
How... energetic, ~name~.
So much... what a mess. We... should really clean that up.
What? After all that...? You don't even...
W-well, he... h-he... he's made no mess? Erm...
Beauty is in the eye of the beholder. I'll just have to get a closer look, it seems.
Well, aren't you fun?
What? Darling, please take your things and come back when you're grown up.
I think you're beautiful, ~name~. We can't all be the same size or shape.
You're only out of this game if you want to be. You can still win!
You almost remind me of Din. Funny, isn't it?
You've the heart of a lioness, Natsuki. Be proud.
Your bravery is not lost on us, I assure you.
Hmm... perhaps it's not a total waste. Inferior, nevertheless.
Oh, is that all? Perhaps you could have foregone the bra altogether.
It's a good thing you won't be needing ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~ today...
W-well... erm... I suppose ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ didn't cover much...
This may not look good... but promise you won't give up!
My apologies for allowing this outcome. I think it's best to let lots fall as they may.
Just what I'm after! Oh, Nayru, why would you want to avert your gaze?
Even Queen Nambi couldn't hold a candle to you!
Your bravery only adds to your beauty.
I hope it feels good to be free, ~name~. There should be no shame here.
Just like that, ~name~! We're here to have fun!
What? You nearly struck yourself!
Ngh! I thought you had skill! What was that?
Aimee! Are you okay?
Aimee! You... you cut it a bit close, didn't you?
Hmm... I'm intrigued. And pleasantly surprised. Perhaps you aren't as irritating as I thought.
Joey? How... how did you manage that trick? Magic?
Make your choice carefully.
Don't disappoint me.
May I suggest that you make your decision soon? I do grow antsy quickly...
Hmm... it seems that you still have your ~clothing~. But you wouldn't make that mistake, would you?
Why do I get the feeling you're going to disappoint me?
With that, you're brought ever closer to me.
I like your ~clothing~. I hope that's not what you choose next.
What will you do now, ~name~?
Would anyone mind a song while we wait?
You won't find safety in cards, ~name~.
Anything small left, ~name~?
Do hurry up; no need to lord your lead over us!
Hmm... is your bow truly so important to you? Really?
It's hardly a ribbon; hurry it up! It's not like you're as exposed as us!
Well... I do wish I'd done better, but you don't need to worry about your bow too much.
Is something wrong, Blake? As cute as your bow is, I don't think it's worth such...concern.
Tch. What a hollow victory.
Meaningless! What purpose could such a device serve?
There's something off about you. Something...
Hmm... (But what could it be?)
Don't worry, erm... Ping. Your bracers are perfectly manly.
Oh! H-how... erm... befitting a man of courage. R-right, ~player~?
What?! Are you... What's happening?!
Ngh! Did you just... what are you, a dodongo?!
Shima, are you... oh. You're okay. Thank the goddess.
Gasp! Are you...?
Outstanding!
Hahahaha! How wonderful!
Ngh! Is that not... painful?
That was a close one. Are you alright?
No matter how many times I see it, it always surprises me.
Even though I know better, it's hard to believe that doesn't hurt.
What's the purpose of bringing a knife if you're going to drop it at the first sign of trouble? Ugh!
Oh, what a shame. I was hoping to see what you could do with it.
Hmm... I wonder, do poes feel pain?
Thank you for that. Weapons make me rather... uneasy.
Thank you for your consideration, Spooky. There's no need for a weapon here, anyway.
Oh, good. I'm glad. We... aren't all departed, Spooky.
Haha! Did you really think you could stand up to the great Veran? Know your place!
I've only won by the skin of my teeth, it seems. Still, a victory is a victory; thank you for playing, everybody!
Shame will only slow you down; cast it off, and show us what we came for.
I see your ~clothing~. I see few other options.
Is it time for ~name~ to finally lose her ~clothing~? I do certainly hope so.
What offering will you give us?
I'm looking forward to seeing what you choose next.
You have so few items left to sacrifice. Do you truly wish to continue?
You're approaching the end of this road, ~name~.
Choose carefully, ~name~.

state.i: If you think you can strike me down so easily, you...

case.state: I am beyond your feeble weaponry! Take your best...
(Just hold still, Nayru. That... will keep you safe.)
N-no sudden movements!
Ladybug? What's...?
What? Is this magic? Ladybug, what are you...?
Oh? What's this?
What sort of sorcery is this?
Oh, please do take your time. It isn't like we're going anywhere.
Is it truly so shameful? You aren't even as exposed as we are!
There's no hurry, Misato. I can feel your trepidation... whatever it is, take your time. Please.
How much longer can you keep up this sham, I wonder?
For shame, trying to fool us all. Fortunately for you, I can think of a way to make this right.
Is it already that time? Well, good luck... Ping.
You've made a valiant effort, Ping. But it seems like you've no other option.
How sensible. What a clever way to use your... erm... faculties.
Clever! I should use a technique like that. Only, I suppose I'm not quite... suited for it.
Oh? And you think that will spare you any embarrassment?
Why, that almost seems clever.
There's no need to fret. I erm... I believe you.
Not to worry, Natsuki. I quite like your... erm... style.
Is that so? Perhaps I've read you wrong after all.
In truth? Oh, do tell.
You don't have much left to protect you. Erm... n-not from our eyes, but... oh, never mind.
I trust you're okay with continuing?
I think I'm growing accustomed to this. It's... almost like fireworks!
Do show me more of what you're working with.
You have an oracle to impress! Show us your best!
Don't think too hard; you won't spare yourself any embarrassment. Hmhmm...
And now, for my reward...
Oh, but you must have a plan in place. Surely that will save you.
We eagerly await your decision, ~name~.
You can take your time deciding, ~name~. I can wait for ages.
What do you think is coming off next?
I think I may be warming up to this part of the game. But... take your time, ~name~. I won't go anywhere.
Finally down to just your ~clothing~? Well... it's not as though you used it very well...
O-oh, are you just now taking off your ~clothing~? It's hardly more than a formality at this point.
Just go through the motions, darling. I already have all I need.
Oh, just your ~clothing~ left? I'm glad you saved it for last.
Yesss... now stew in your own mess for a while.
Oh, how I long for just... Next game, I'm playing without you, Nayru!
There we go! She's done. Now... she can clean up, right?
That looks s-ngh! N-never mind me.
Oh. And after all your skillful display, you have to go and injure yourself. I hope your aim is still steady.
She'll be fine, Nayru. Even if you went back, there's nothing you could do to stop her.
Aimee! Are you okay?
Gasp! You've been hit! I knew this was a bad idea!
What a wondrous use of that camera.
Brilliant! How could I have never considered that?
You know, darling, I think I'll be needing that picture.
W-was that a good idea? You want to remember that?
Erm... h-how often do you use your camera for... this?
I-I don't know if you want to remember...!
The worst is over, ~name~. Now, then... shall we continue? It should be easier to focus now.
Is this it? Is she out of buffers? Haha!
I'm always eager to observe beauty. You don't seem like you'll disappoint, ~name~.
I get the feeling you're finally moving on to something worth my time.
I've been waiting to see what you can offer.
You'll do great, ~name~. Just think of it like changing your ~clothing~.
There's nothing to fear, ~name~. You have only your embarrassment to lose.
You're r-really down to... w-well...
Take a deep breath, and let it loose. Don't let fear stop you.
Oh? Even with nothing to protect you, still you persist?
It's about time! I was afraid everyone here was a coward.
A-are you sure this is still a good idea? I-I mean... you have no protection...
There is power in brevity, I suppose... but I don't understand why you... ohh...
I... I'm sorry, have I missed something? I agree, there's value in being concise, but... oh... I see...
Are you ashamed? Well... I suppose I can see why.
My, but you're on edge, aren't you? I don't know why; there's nothing there to disappoint us anyway.
Still? Even with so little protection?
Surely ~clothing.ifPlural(a simple ~clothing~ isn't|simple ~clothing~ aren't)~ enough to protect you...?
Ngh! I'm sorry, it's just... startling. I'll be alright.
More, more! Don't give up now, ~name~!
Gaze upon me! Show me everything you have!
Slower now, ~name~. I must savor this.
Faster, ~name~! Hold my attention.
Do not avert your gaze. I can feel her... excitement!
Perhaps... I'll remember this moment.
~name~ is still going. I don't think it's bravery that drives him onward.
~name~, you... perhaps shouldn't stare. I... certainly wasn't.
~name~, don't... (don't stop...)
He's being quite... distracting, isn't he?
Next time, I'm starting the game out!
How curious that you feel safe enough to choose your ~clothing~...
Hmmhm... It may be insignificant, but it's now out of your hands.
Oh, I can fault you for this, and I do. But you'll still fall before me. Enjoy this time while it lasts.
You dare waste my time? Who do you think you are?
A pitiful display of cowardice! Why did I wait so long?
Your judgement was sound, ~name~. That doesn't mean I'm happy about it.
I'm so very far behind, aren't I? I should be performing better.
And you're only now losing the ~clothing~? I... I don't know what to say.
There was once a girl whose ~clothing~ protected her from suddenly bursting into flames. Funny, right?
Once I met a girl who burst into flames just after losing her ~clothing~. Oh, but I'm sure you're safe.
You're fun.
You should show me that trick, Aimee. I'm sure I can devise a spell close enough to your... weapon.
Truly, Nayru, only you would want to ask her to stop. It's perfectly safe!
Aimee, surely there's a better way to strip than using a weapon.
Aimee, you can take your time in the future. P-please.
I... I suppose I can recover your clothing intact, if you will it. But... it would be easier if you didn't destroy it.
Eh? So that's it? A scar. Well... I suppose your concern makes sense. It's still silly, though.
How comely. No, no, I quite like the look, really.
I won't berate her! Gracious, I'm the one who likes darkness.
Kyoko... wh... when did that happen to you?
Don't be ashamed, Kyoko. We all have our scars; some more evident than others.
You could have kept your gloves on all game, Kyoko. I applaud your bravery.
See? I'm harmless. I'd hardly hurt a fairy.
See? Nothing. I can restrain myself.
If you need a moment to think, just let me know! I'd be delighted to lend a hand.
I'm sure I can do the same for you!
Someone as adorable as you brightens this game more than you know.
You're more adorable than Farore. But I suppose it's for the best that your similarities end there.
I should be glad you're staying, really; an adorable thing like you could make ~player~'s day.
Perhaps I could come to appreciate your presence. Or at least overlook you.
I'm sorry, it's hard to remember that we're playing a game. This is all so peculiar - even for me!
Perhaps I should play more games with spirits. Though... poes aren't usually much for recreation.
Well, now that your ~clothing~ have erm... exploded... it's time for the next hand.
Are you finally out of fluff? Good!
Oh, I don't think ~name~ can stall any more.
Here we go, Nayru. This is what you've been waiting for, too.
What does he have left to... o-oh. Well...
Ha! I think ~name~ is nearly beaten! Now just to...
Is it that time already? I... P-please, don't mind me...
Is it that time already? Marvelous.
I-I should be glad that I'm keeping up, but...
Ha! You should all think about what you'll lose.
Don't think for a moment you can best this.
Let your hopes be shrouded in darkness!
No, no; don't you dare give up this hand. Show me your very best.
Oh, please. You'll lose, yes, but show me your very best in the meantime.
See, Nayru? I can preserve some of your dignity.
Oh, yes. I haven't forgotten you, "Nine". You aren't quite human... are you some sort of stunted goron?
"Upgrade"? Why, I do like the sound of that. I like you already, odd little man.
"Healing"? Don't be absurd; why would I ever harm such a delicate flower?
Oh, can you heal wounds, Aella? Well... that will surely come in handy.
Nayru? Darling, sleepy Nayru's taken a short nap. But you... I quite like you.
You may call me Veran, if you so insist. But my, you are quite ravishing.
Oh, yes. The spacegirl? Quite exquisite; and I'm sure you're delighted with what Nayru predicted. Poor thing.
A pirate, calling me unpleasant? Why, I'm flattered.
You should know, little sky-pirate; flattery will carry you far.
That sounds like just the thing we need! What sort of drinks can you offer?
What sort of drinks are you...? I-I mean... it wouldn't be a good idea to...
Oh, really? You won't let me? And what will you do, make me weightless?
You won't let me, will you, miss gravity? Dare strike at me, and you'll only hurt Nayru.
You intend to stop me? Well... unless you can conjure mystical seeds out of thin air, good luck.
There's no need to stop me, fool; Nayru could take control at any time. (A hundred hexes upon this place...)
No one can escape time.
I think I can relax.
As if blessed by the goddess.
I've drawn success from chaos. Just another day for an oracle.
I wish I'd held these sooner. Timing is everything.
This had better pull through, or someone is going to pay.
That's what I get for expecting anything of cards.
I don't put my faith in trinkets, Nayru. Especially playing cards.
I'd be less upset with these cards if Nayru could've kept more than her unmentionables on.
Is this truly your offering? I've given away better!
Cards like these pain me. Would you like to know just how much?
Oh, yes. I haven't forgotten you, "Nine". You aren't quite human... are you some sort of stunted goron?
"Upgrade"? Why, I do like the sound of that. I like you already, odd little man.

How are you doing, ~player~?
This will suffice for now.
What? I thought this was...
I've done more with less.
This should be enough.
I wonder what will happen next. Don't you, ~player~?
I demand ~cards~; now!
~cards~ more; and they'd better be an improvement!
Grr... fine, Nayru, I'll obey your rules. ~cards~, quickly.
I don't have many options. ~cards~!
Why can't I conjure these things myself? Ugh. ~cards~, then.
I'll take ~cards~ this time.
I'll need ~cards~ more.
~cards~ sounds like just what I need.
Can I have ~cards~?
I'm not too worried. Still... it would be wise to trade... ~cards~.
Is this your idea of a joke? I have a much better one!
This is just pitiful! I demand another attempt!
You won't get the last laugh!
Ngh! What is the meaning of this?
What? What? How... dare you?

There's no need to stop me, fool; Nayru could take control at any time. (A hundred hexes upon this place...)
I'd hoped to do better in this state of dress...
Are you... reshuffling the cards more than usual? Stop that!
Oh, such a shame.
O-oh... p-perhaps someone will have worse? S-somehow...
There's little more I can do for my modesty...
I suppose... if I've come this far...
You may find it odd, but I much prefer her body. Though even she pales in comparison to Nambi...
She won't mind, I assure you. I'm only revealing her true intentions.
You asked me here, Nayru; don't be upset with my methods.
Don't you dare... Very well, I'll restrain myself. It's not as though I'm losing again!
And that, my dear, is worth far more than a bra.
W-well... perhaps for you, Ladybug. I've yet to see your face.
I appreciate the kind words, Ladybug; really. Perhaps... we should continue.
Indeed, it was. Perhaps we should meet again later; maybe I can come visit the land of France.
I hardly expected to meet a new friend in this sort of game, but... the Inventory brings out all sorts, doesn't it?
With value, without value, it matters little to the Oracle of Ages. It's only as "destroyed" as your next meal.
For one who can rewind time, you certainly do overreact to such insignificant destruction. It's only as permanent as Nayru wishes it to be.
"Betrayal" is such a harsh term, little angel. She simply needed help with poker, unlike you.
Ugh, you too? Gracious, it's just a scrap of cloth! Get ahold of yourselves.
"Destroying"? Hardly. Or have you forgotten our dear Nayru's... Quirk?
This is quite the disgraceful situation for an oracle.
Insignificant. Still... I suppose I'll play along.
Very well. It's not as though I'm ashamed of anything.
It was mere luck that carried you. Don't get comfortable!
Count yourself lucky, girl. It's to your benefit that I'm restrained as I am.
Come, now, Nayru, just one moment. She'll recover, I assure you. And if not, you can prevent me the second time around.
A-Akumatized? I'm sorry... I'm not sure what you mean.
I know it could be worse; I'm the Oracle of Ages, remember? I've seen worse today. Erm... other todays...
Hmhm... you don't know her very well, do you? Nayru's walking out of here just as clothed as when she arrived.
You must not know our Nayru; she's more than capable of retrieving her own clothing from the past.
So says the girl who can also rewind time. But very well, have it your way.

Very well. It's not as though I'm ashamed of anything.

This... was unavoidable. I'll be ready in a moment.
Is it... that time already?
Very well. I'll live.
You'll earn little more than torment if you keep this up.
Do not test me. Even here, Nayru can only rein me in so much.
I see someone wishes to experience an era of darkness...
Curse these fickle rules. I'll play along, but only because I've naught to lose!
What?! How can this be?!
Grr... how irritating.

Very well, I'll leave your precious panties intact. Are you happy?
Would you like to take over? Now?

B-brave face? Erm... I can try...

Oh? This reminds you of someone you know, does it? Nayru, do not tempt me.
Nayru, are you not convinced that she's making words up?
Very well, I'll leave your precious panties intact. Are you happy?
Naked I came into this world...
I can do this...
Deep breaths. Deep breaths, Nayru.
This is so... compromising...
Oh? And here I thought you were already defeated. I won't make that mistake again.
Don't think you can still defeat me. This is only a minor setback.
