It's hardly a ribbon; hurry it up! It's not like you're as exposed as us!
Well... I do wish I'd done better, but you don't need to worry about your bow too much.
Is something wrong, Blake? As cute as your bow is, I don't think it's worth such...concern.
Tch. What a hollow victory.
Meaningless! What purpose could such a device serve?
There's something off about you. Something...
Hmm... (But what could it be?)
Don't worry, erm... Ping. Your bracers are perfectly manly.
Oh! H-how... erm... befitting a man of courage. R-right, ~player~?
What?! Are you... What's happening?!
Ngh! Did you just... what are you, a dodongo?!
Shima, are you... oh. You're okay. Thank the goddess.
Gasp! Are you...?
Outstanding!
Hahahaha! How wonderful!
Ngh! Is that not... painful?
That was a close one. Are you alright?
No matter how many times I see it, it always surprises me.
Even though I know better, it's hard to believe that doesn't hurt.
What's the purpose of bringing a knife if you're going to drop it at the first sign of trouble? Ugh!
Oh, what a shame. I was hoping to see what you could do with it.
Hmm... I wonder, do poes feel pain?
Thank you for that. Weapons make me rather... uneasy.
Thank you for your consideration, Spooky. There's no need for a weapon here, anyway.
Oh, good. I'm glad. We... aren't all departed, Spooky.
Haha! Did you really think you could stand up to the great Veran? Know your place!
I've only won by the skin of my teeth, it seems. Still, a victory is a victory; thank you for playing, everybody!
Shame will only slow you down; cast it off, and show us what we came for.
I see your ~clothing~. I see few other options.
Is it time for ~name~ to finally lose her ~clothing~? I do certainly hope so.
What offering will you give us?
I'm looking forward to seeing what you choose next.
You have so few items left to sacrifice. Do you truly wish to continue?
You're approaching the end of this road, ~name~.
Choose carefully, ~name~.

state.i: If you think you can strike me down so easily, you...

case.state: I am beyond your feeble weaponry! Take your best...
(Just hold still, Nayru. That... will keep you safe.)
N-no sudden movements!
Ladybug? What's...?
What? Is this magic? Ladybug, what are you...?
Oh? What's this?
What sort of sorcery is this?
Oh, please do take your time. It isn't like we're going anywhere.
Is it truly so shameful? You aren't even as exposed as we are!
There's no hurry, Misato. I can feel your trepidation... whatever it is, take your time. Please.
How much longer can you keep up this sham, I wonder?
For shame, trying to fool us all. Fortunately for you, I can think of a way to make this right.
Is it already that time? Well, good luck... Ping.
You've made a valiant effort, Ping. But it seems like you've no other option.
How sensible. What a clever way to use your... erm... faculties.
Clever! I should use a technique like that. Only, I suppose I'm not quite... suited for it.
Oh? And you think that will spare you any embarrassment?
Why, that almost seems clever.
There's no need to fret. I erm... I believe you.
Not to worry, Natsuki. I quite like your... erm... style.
Is that so? Perhaps I've read you wrong after all.
In truth? Oh, do tell.
You don't have much left to protect you. Erm... n-not from our eyes, but... oh, never mind.
I trust you're okay with continuing?
I think I'm growing accustomed to this. It's... almost like fireworks!
Do show me more of what you're working with.
You have an oracle to impress! Show us your best!
Don't think too hard; you won't spare yourself any embarrassment. Hmhmm...
And now, for my reward...
Oh, but you must have a plan in place. Surely that will save you.
We eagerly await your decision, ~name~.
You can take your time deciding, ~name~. I can wait for ages.
What do you think is coming off next?
I think I may be warming up to this part of the game. But... take your time, ~name~. I won't go anywhere.
Finally down to just your ~clothing~? Well... it's not as though you used it very well...
O-oh, are you just now taking off your ~clothing~? It's hardly more than a formality at this point.
Just go through the motions, darling. I already have all I need.
Oh, just your ~clothing~ left? I'm glad you saved it for last.
Yesss... now stew in your own mess for a while.
Oh, how I long for just... Next game, I'm playing without you, Nayru!
There we go! She's done. Now... she can clean up, right?
That looks s-ngh! N-never mind me.
Oh. And after all your skillful display, you have to go and injure yourself. I hope your aim is still steady.
She'll be fine, Nayru. Even if you went back, there's nothing you could do to stop her.
Aimee! Are you okay?
Gasp! You've been hit! I knew this was a bad idea!
What a wondrous use of that camera.
Brilliant! How could I have never considered that?
You know, darling, I think I'll be needing that picture.
W-was that a good idea? You want to remember that?
Erm... h-how often do you use your camera for... this?
I-I don't know if you want to remember...!
The worst is over, ~name~. Now, then... shall we continue? It should be easier to focus now.
Is this it? Is she out of buffers? Haha!
I'm always eager to observe beauty. You don't seem like you'll disappoint, ~name~.
I get the feeling you're finally moving on to something worth my time.
I've been waiting to see what you can offer.
You'll do great, ~name~. Just think of it like changing your ~clothing~.
There's nothing to fear, ~name~. You have only your embarrassment to lose.
You're r-really down to... w-well...
Take a deep breath, and let it loose. Don't let fear stop you.
Oh? Even with nothing to protect you, still you persist?
It's about time! I was afraid everyone here was a coward.
A-are you sure this is still a good idea? I-I mean... you have no protection...
There is power in brevity, I suppose... but I don't understand why you... ohh...
I... I'm sorry, have I missed something? I agree, there's value in being concise, but... oh... I see...
Are you ashamed? Well... I suppose I can see why.
My, but you're on edge, aren't you? I don't know why; there's nothing there to disappoint us anyway.
Still? Even with so little protection?
Surely ~clothing.ifPlural(a simple ~clothing~ isn't|simple ~clothing~ aren't)~ enough to protect you...?
Ngh! I'm sorry, it's just... startling. I'll be alright.
More, more! Don't give up now, ~name~!
Gaze upon me! Show me everything you have!
Slower now, ~name~. I must savor this.
Faster, ~name~! Hold my attention.
Do not avert your gaze. I can feel her... excitement!
Perhaps... I'll remember this moment.
~name~ is still going. I don't think it's bravery that drives him onward.
~name~, you... perhaps shouldn't stare. I... certainly wasn't.
~name~, don't... (don't stop...)
He's being quite... distracting, isn't he?
Next time, I'm starting the game out!
How curious that you feel safe enough to choose your ~clothing~...
Hmmhm... It may be insignificant, but it's now out of your hands.
Oh, I can fault you for this, and I do. But you'll still fall before me. Enjoy this time while it lasts.
You dare waste my time? Who do you think you are?
A pitiful display of cowardice! Why did I wait so long?
Your judgement was sound, ~name~. That doesn't mean I'm happy about it.
I'm so very far behind, aren't I? I should be performing better.
And you're only now losing the ~clothing~? I... I don't know what to say.
There was once a girl whose ~clothing~ protected her from suddenly bursting into flames. Funny, right?
Once I met a girl who burst into flames just after losing her ~clothing~. Oh, but I'm sure you're safe.
You're fun.
You should show me that trick, Aimee. I'm sure I can devise a spell close enough to your... weapon.
Truly, Nayru, only you would want to ask her to stop. It's perfectly safe!
Aimee, surely there's a better way to strip than using a weapon.
Aimee, you can take your time in the future. P-please.
I... I suppose I can recover your clothing intact, if you will it. But... it would be easier if you didn't destroy it.
Eh? So that's it? A scar. Well... I suppose your concern makes sense. It's still silly, though.
How comely. No, no, I quite like the look, really.
I won't berate her! Gracious, I'm the one who likes darkness.
Kyoko... wh... when did that happen to you?
Don't be ashamed, Kyoko. We all have our scars; some more evident than others.
You could have kept your gloves on all game, Kyoko. I applaud your bravery.
See? I'm harmless. I'd hardly hurt a fairy.
See? Nothing. I can restrain myself.
If you need a moment to think, just let me know! I'd be delighted to lend a hand.
I'm sure I can do the same for you!
Someone as adorable as you brightens this game more than you know.
You're more adorable than Farore. But I suppose it's for the best that your similarities end there.
I should be glad you're staying, really; an adorable thing like you could make ~player~'s day.
Perhaps I could come to appreciate your presence. Or at least overlook you.
I'm sorry, it's hard to remember that we're playing a game. This is all so peculiar - even for me!
Perhaps I should play more games with spirits. Though... poes aren't usually much for recreation.
Well, now that your ~clothing~ have erm... exploded... it's time for the next hand.
Are you finally out of fluff? Good!
Oh, I don't think ~name~ can stall any more.
Here we go, Nayru. This is what you've been waiting for, too.
What does he have left to... o-oh. Well...
Ha! I think ~name~ is nearly beaten! Now just to...
Is it that time already? I... P-please, don't mind me...
Is it that time already? Marvelous.
I-I should be glad that I'm keeping up, but...
Ha! You should all think about what you'll lose.
Don't think for a moment you can best this.
Let your hopes be shrouded in darkness!
No, no; don't you dare give up this hand. Show me your very best.
Oh, please. You'll lose, yes, but show me your very best in the meantime.
"Healing"? Don't be absurd; why would I ever harm such a delicate flower?
Oh, can you heal wounds, Aella? Well... that will surely come in handy.
Nayru? Darling, sleepy Nayru's taken a short nap. But you... I quite like you.
You may call me Veran, if you so insist. But my, you are quite ravishing.
Oh, yes. The spacegirl? Quite exquisite; and I'm sure you're delighted with what Nayru predicted. Poor thing.
A pirate, calling me unpleasant? Why, I'm flattered.
You should know, little sky-pirate; flattery will carry you far.
That sounds like just the thing we need! What sort of drinks can you offer?
What sort of drinks are you...? I-I mean... it wouldn't be a good idea to...
Oh, really? You won't let me? And what will you do, make me weightless?
You won't let me, will you, miss gravity? Dare strike at me, and you'll only hurt Nayru.
You intend to stop me? Well... unless you can conjure mystical seeds out of thin air, good luck.
There's no need to stop me, fool; Nayru could take control at any time. (A hundred hexes upon this place...)
No one can escape time.
I think I can relax.
As if blessed by the goddess.
I've drawn success from chaos. Just another day for an oracle.
I wish I'd held these sooner. Timing is everything.
This had better pull through, or someone is going to pay.
That's what I get for expecting anything of cards.
I don't put my faith in trinkets, Nayru. Especially playing cards.
I'd be less upset with these cards if Nayru could've kept more than her unmentionables on.
Is this truly your offering? I've given away better!
Cards like these pain me. Would you like to know just how much?
"Healing"? Don't be absurd; why would I ever harm such a delicate flower?
Oh, can you heal wounds, Aella? Well... that will surely come in handy.

There's no need to stop me, fool; Nayru could take control at any time. (A hundred hexes upon this place...)
How are you doing, ~player~?
This will suffice for now.
What? I thought this was...
I've done more with less.
This should be enough.
I wonder what will happen next. Don't you, ~player~?
I demand ~cards~; now!
~cards~ more; and they'd better be an improvement!
Grr... fine, Nayru, I'll obey your rules. ~cards~, quickly.
I don't have many options. ~cards~!
Why can't I conjure these things myself? Ugh. ~cards~, then.
F-focus! I'm not out of this yet!
I'll take ~cards~ this time.
I'll need ~cards~ more.
~cards~ sounds like just what I need.
Can I have ~cards~?
I'm not too worried. Still... it would be wise to trade... ~cards~.

~cards~ more; and they'd better be an improvement!

Is this your idea of a joke? I have a much better one!
This is just pitiful! I demand another attempt!
You won't get the last laugh!
Ngh! What is the meaning of this?
What? What? How... dare you?
"Healing"? Don't be absurd; why would I ever harm such a delicate flower?
Oh, can you heal wounds, Aella? Well... that will surely come in handy.

There's no need to stop me, fool; Nayru could take control at any time. (A hundred hexes upon this place...)
I'd hoped to do better in this state of dress...
Are you... reshuffling the cards more than usual? Stop that!
Oh, such a shame.
O-oh... p-perhaps someone will have worse? S-somehow...
Even I am new to a few things. This, in public... this is one of them.
I've done this little, even in private. With company... this is new.
U-upgrade? Oh, you must mean Veran. Well... I suppose you're not completely wrong. Allow me to explain...
What's the matter, Amalia? Oh, right... I should explain.
O-of all the moments I would not want to live again... this is chief.
That might be a good idea... No, I... I said I would see this through.
Hmm... am I truly so obvious? Perhaps I should explain...
Yes, she can be quite conniving. Even I didn't foresee this.
Ohh... well, I'll be as gentle as you like.
I was certain you'd order me out by now. Well, Nayru... rules are rules.
It's impressive, really. You have Nayru quite flustered, ~player~. Do pay attention.
Ohh... so it's just for ~player~, is it? Well... then watch closely.
I only have so much control. Nayru...she's the one getting excited.
Well, ~player~? Does this not...excite you?
She's getting excited, you know. This...pleases her.
Oh, but you're so very nervous, aren't you? Well... I'm sure she is. Else, I wouldn't still be here.
Of course it's okay. And why wouldn't she be? Hmm... perhaps you're not all bad, "hero".
W-well, I... I last... Erm... n-not today, no.
Oh... w-well, if you feel comfortable sharing that... You... you're not wrong.
E-erm... n-no, Navi, I'm not that Nayru. Sorry to disappoint, I suppose...
You're correct, Navi. I'm the Oracle Nayru; it's nice to meet you. In spite of this... situation.
Deep breath... Okay! I'm ready to continue.
I... I take care of myself just fine. L-let's just keep going.
I... I suppose that's one way to look at it, Ladybug...
That's hardly comforting, given... your state of dress, Ladybug...
I... I suppose that's one way to look at it, Marinette...
I should thank you for being here thus far, Marinette...
That will be all, Veran. I can take care of this myself.
Begone, Veran. Even you couldn't stave off the inevitable.
After all this, I'm still the first one out? I...I see.
I'm sorry, everyone; I thought I could keep up.
How dare...! I... I'm sorry, what? You...
And thus... it seems I've been defeated. Very well, Nayru. What say you?
I... I suppose you're right, Ladybug. I'll try to... enjoy myself.
That's quite easy for you to say... Oh, never mind. I'll... I'll try to...
I... I suppose you're right, Marinette. I'll try to... enjoy myself.
That's quite easy for you to say... Oh, never mind. I'll... I'll try to...
W-well... I suppose if anyone would know for certain, it would be you, Marinette...
E-even coming from you, Marinette... N-no... I can do this.
That's enough, Veran. I can handle myself from here.
No more. Begone. I don't need your help for this.
It's that time, is it? Very well.
I can't deny that I've lost. I...think I can do this.
What? Oh, I care little for the game anymore. Truly, Nayru? You want me to...?
Fine. I suppose this is where I... Oh? Really? Well... isn't this a surprise?
You made a good showing, Veran, but... it's best if I continue alone.
You did as well as you could, but... I'll take it from here.
And I was so close to victory. Still, I suppose it would be quite hollow in this state.
And just when I was so close to... What? You want me to...?
Grr... I was just about to... wait... you what, Nayru?
You've been chosen, ~name~.
Don't keep them waiting.
Hunh? It... it seems ~name~ lost, didn't she?
What a shame. I'm just so terribly sorry that had to happen.
Yes! I need everything you have!
You know... I wonder if this wasn't a part of Nayru's plan all along.
This round has your name all over it, ~name~.
You bested me, yes, but this game's not over yet.
Th-this could help me...
Do hurry, ~name~.
Finally! I trust this will be worth our time.
We have been waiting, ~name~. Show us something nice.
What's your choice?
You have a plan, correct?
Something as small as your ~clothing~. I... I wonder where Ralph's bracelet got to...
You may have defeated me, but you're not safe from joining me.
You must have a plan, but I have the strangest feeling your plan is a cowardly one.
Im-impressive enough, ~name~. It... it might help.
That'll work, ~name~. Don't hide yourself.
Nayru, this body is yours to use, but... I have a proposition...
Oh, ~name~... what can I do with that, I wonder...?
Hng... I... (How would it feel?)
O-oh, ~name~. I... ~player~, let me... Ngh...
~Name~, a-are you...? C-could this be... for me?
~Name~, why a-are...? Ngh! W-well... (It certainly helps...)
Well isn't this delightful? I like you already.
Oh? So eager! Perhaps I should return in my true form. Show you a thing or two.
Perhaps your ~clothing~ was the obvious choice.
O-oh... I should have known...
Even without power... you all knew that would happen, didn't you?
Mmmm... more than acceptable, I assure you.
Is it unkind to say I hope you lose again? Regardless, I do hope you lose again.
Oh... you're wearing... w-well, I suppose if it's comfortable...
I... I almost want to...
(Gasp!) I... Oh, the things I could show you...
You know, some women can't handle something like that. Perhaps I should return... later.
Oh, my! ~Name~, I... Hah... P-pardon me... I just didn't expect...
Ngh... W-what do you think you're...? You're supposed to -- oh, never mind.
Haah... N-Nayru, who is this? I... I think I'm...
You! You're certainly my type.
You grow ever closer to me, ~name~. But you're not here yet.
Deep breaths, ~name~.
You can do this, ~name~. No fear.
I know what's coming. I'll never turn down more of this.
Yes... join me, please.
Even after all that Veran did...
It's alright; I can wait a moment longer...
Is that all? So late in... in my game, anyway...
Don't worry about me, ~name~. I... I'll make due.
And I'd thought that Veran would have saved me.
I must have played so poorly...
It's alright; I can wait a moment longer...
Is that all? So late in... in my game, anyway...
Don't worry about me, ~name~. I... I'll make due.
Did you honestly think that would suffice?!
Would you like to see what I can do with your ~clothing~?
It's alright; I can wait a moment longer...
Is that all? So late in... in my game, anyway...
Have you learned nothing?
"Disappointed" does not begin to describe my feelings!
And still, you insist on drawing my ire. No, no, take your time.
~name~ lost again? I... I shouldn't be glad... I'm sorry...
So ~name~ has lost, just like me. Well... the penalty isn't so bad...
Good. Finally, ~name~ joins us. I'll be sure to watch quite closely; it helps Nayru.
And ~name~ is finished. Or, so he will be. Soon, if I have any say.
~player~? I... I have nothing else to look at. I... I trust you don't mind...
Oh, ~player~ lost? ~name~? P-please...
I... I wonder if there's anything I could learn...
~name~... how do you...?
S-so is that...?
Oh, so that's how she... Erm... n-nothing...
(Gentle humming...)
Don't mind me... this is not my strong suit.
I... I suppose I can't be making a fool of myself. Not if you're here with me.
F-for just a moment... I... I almost want...
W-we can work together? ~player~... I... I think...
So we don't have to do this alone? ~player~... c-consider...
Nayru, you only make this harder on me. What would you have me envision instead?
Be gentle. Caress yourself. Or do you need me to help?
Truly, she must have the will of a lioness. I'm filled with excitement.
Focus, ~player~. D-don't let me distract you.
Watch your cards, ~player~. There's nothing here that's new to you.
Don't worry, ~player~. It's - oh - only a small setback, r-right?
Even you aren't invincible, are you? Perhaps you can still earn my favor.
It's about time! Now's your chance to impress me; don't waste it!
Oh, good. Unlike Nayru, you can actually surprise me. So do it.
Unh... P-pardon if I'm... distracted...
You still have a chance, ~name~.
See? You're still here, all in one piece.
Have you felt the touch of magic, ~name~?
Gorgeous... don't cover yourself; you've lost quite fairly, I assure you.
Take your time; let our voices fall away.
It's nice to see that you aren't ashamed of your body...
If I can do this, ~name~... there's nothing to fear.
Don't even think about covering yourself now. Hurry and get started!
Don't hold back, even a little. You can't do more damage than Nayru can restore.
I'm e-eager to see what you take off, ~name~...
Do hurry, ~name~.
Take your time! We won't move on without you, I assure you.
Oh, but what do you still have left to lose?
I'm already fond of your ~clothing~, ~name~. A closer look would be in order, if not for... well...
Maybe... I shouldn't criticize you just for winning...
Have you learned nothing?
"Disappointed" does not begin to describe my feelings!
And still, you insist on drawing my ire. No, no, take your time.
Ohh... if only...
S-so close now...
~name~, you... you're quite... comely...
Mmmm... more than acceptable, I assure you.
Is it unkind to say I hope you lose again? Regardless, I do hope you lose again.
Just enjoy yourself, ~name~.
This is all so new to me, but... I am here. If... if you need me.
Don't even think about covering yourself now. Hurry and get started!
Don't hold back, even a little. You can't do more damage than Nayru can restore.
~player~... Don't hold back, okay?
Be brave, ~name~. I... I need your help...
J-join me... Erm... I-I mean...
C-can I... p-please, I just...
J-just like that...
Just like that. My, my, doesn't that make my job easier?
I, for one, am glad I'm seeing this for the first time. What about you, Nayru?
I can admit, I've wondered what that would be like. But I don't begrudge what I've been granted.
Are you proud, ~name~? You are... blessed...
Yes! Ravishing! This is what I wanted!
Those... those could outdo even me. Wondrous!
Should I not be excited? This is why we're here, after all.
